posts.post_content: Up for sale is an 1888 R&S ARTISTIC BASEBALL-PANEL  INDIANAPOLIS/CHICAGO/BOSTON.  $350.00 OR BEST OFFER. Please email me at [url]cagard1@comcast.net[/url] if interested.
